Title: A Regular Earl Anthony
Plot: Tom Shayes considers his options as Patty continues to strain to keep her clients happy. Arthur tells Ray that he needs to put more pressure on Patty to make the case go away.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman, Mark F
GuestStars: Robin Thomas, Jennifer Roszell, Natalie Venetia Belcon, Jennifer Missoni, Jimmy Burke, Sarah Viccellio, Carla Occhiogrosso, John Cenatiempo, Donal Logue, Debra Monk, Michael Angelo
